Title: Adam
Overview: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.
Tagline: A story about two strangers. One a little stranger than the other...
production_companies: Vox3 Films, Serenade Films, Olympus Pictures, Deer Path Productions, Northwood Productions
Cast: Hugh Dancy, Rose Byrne, Peter Gallagher
